column3:
ACK

On Tuesday, October 6, 2015, Wladimir J. van der Laan <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> ACK
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6762#issuecomment-145633681.
Next time we should try to look for these things in the review, so they don't require lots of additional pulls to fix up.\n
Yup. Maybe we should add the result of `git status` to the travis build logs?\n
I think that's a good idea @theuni can we add a 'tree is clean post-build' check to Travis? It may be complicated by the fact that we're building from a `make distdir`.\n

It's ugly, but this works locally:

``` patch
diff --git a/.travis.yml b/.travis.yml
index c878514..68362f1 100644
--- a/.travis.yml
+++ b/.travis.yml
@@ -70,4 +70,5 @@ script:
     - if [ "$RUN_TESTS" = "true" ]; then make check; fi
     - if [ "$RUN_TESTS" = "true" ]; then qa/pull-tester/rpc-tests.sh; fi
 after_script:
-    - if [ "$TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST" != "false" ]; then (echo "Uploa
